sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Administration of Psychotropic Medications to Children Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Administration of Psychotropic Medications to Children Act.

sections.heading: Legislative Findings. The General Assembly recognizes that:
sections.text: Legislative Findings. The General Assembly recognizes that:

sections.heading: Administration of psychotropic medications
sections.text: On or before October 1, 2011, the Department of Children and Family Services shall promulgate final rules, amending its current rules establishing and maintaining standards and procedures to govern the administration of psychotropic medications. Such amend

sections.heading: Failure to comply with Department rules
sections.text: The Department must establish and maintain rules designed to ensure compliance with any rules promulgated pursuant to Section 5 of this Act. Such rules shall include, but are not limited to, the following:

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
